name: Deciding The Topic
description: Researching and deciding the topic, performing feasibility studies and requirement analysis.
Created UI and styling similar to phpMyAdmin, the gui format inspiration for this project.
name: Create initial UI

description: Added SQL and NoSQL databases differentiation and context switching between them.
name: Add Context Switching Between Databases

description: Separated logic for SQL and NoSQL into sql_handler and nosql_handler, app.py for main work and differentiating to the two handlers. Ongoing task, as newly added functionalities needs to keep getting separated this way.
name: Separating Logic Of SQL and NoSQL

description: Added logic in both handlers to use db_handler and give work to the required handler to handle database-specific requests.
name: Solidifying Logic Of SQL and NoSQL

description: Performed rigorous regression testing at all steps, at the end of every requirement completion.
name: Perform Regression Testing

description: Fix the handler name shown on the sidebar that shows no handler everywhere except on the home page.
name: Fix Handler Name On Sidebar

description: Added logic to have the programmer use gui to perform CRUD operations on SQL and NoSQL databases and also run queries (Both within tables and outside tables, but not yet outside databases in the sense can't create new databases, can only work within a database i.e work only within SQLLite's database DB1 at a time).
name: Adding GUI For Tables/Collections

description: Added logic to allow alteration of table structure, records and documents via GUI (Shows number of records, collections, tables and documents and they update whenever insertion/creation/deletion are performed).
name: Adding Support For Structure Changes

description: Added db_registry for automatically detecting handlers for plug and play experience (Programmers just need to add a file with *_handler.py and it would automatically be detected and taken as new database type, is the programmer's responsibility to follow guidelines such as stating what type of database it is and it's name and add in all the abstract methods needed)
name: Adding Plug-And-Play Functionality

description: Ability to view or create and open a database in a specific database type with a command on the cmd.
name: Adding Minute Control Over Opening System

description: Fix Query tab on sidebar to work in individual databases and allow creation of databases as well.
name: Adding Global Query Tab

description: Added two SQL databases (SQLLite and DuckDB) and tested for clashes and context switched, fixed issues and clashes.
name: Adding Test SQL DBs

description: Added two NoSQL databases (MongoDB andd TinyDB) and tested if context switching is correctly executed and there are no clashes.
name: Adding Test NoSQL DBs

description: Added tabs for plsql on PostgreSQL that supports it
name: Adding PL/SQL Support For Supported Databases

description: Made all SQL dbs show their db names and table names in their true capitalization (Except Duckdb which apparently has Windows's influence on it that causes dbs to be stored in lowercase but can be accessed with the capitalized form as well since it's case-insensitive and MySQL which in Windows by default stores in lowercase)
name: Ensuring True Capitalization Of DB Names

description: Fix the issue of database getting deleted when it's created and user immediately goes back to list of databases without creating a collection in MongoDB.
name: Fix Empty Collection Bug

description: Added PostgreSQL and MySQL databases to supported SQL databases.
name: Adding MySQL and PostgreSQL Support

description: Fixed issue of sql databases creating databases in the same folder (Causing unrelated dbs to show up in SQLite list of dbs)
name: Fix Bug In SQLite

description: Added triggers tab on PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite which supports it
name: Adding Triggers Support for Supported Databases

description: Add search bar to search db names and table names
name: Add Search Bar

description: Added a credential entry page for DBs like MySQL and PostgreSQL that needs credentials to connect and uses keyring to store these credentials for further access
name: Adding Credential Page

description: Fix the issue of columns containing data refusing to be renamed because they need to be dropped first
name: Fix Column Rename Issue

description: Fix the issue of modify and delete button on documents not working in MongoDB.
name: Fix Modify And Delete Buttons Bug

description: Fix the issue of 0 documents showing in collection_list
name: Fix Documents Number Bug

description: Check if NoSQL databases have issues of saving in the same folder like sql databases had issues with.
name: Checking For Same Bug As SQLite

description: Fixed a bug in regards to MySQL where credentials kept failing (Strongly suspect issue with personal xammp, therefore installed MySQL separately and testing on it, all issues seem to be resolved))
name: Fixing MySQL Credentials Bug

description: Added procedure tab and support for procedure in mysql
name: Adding Procedure Support For Supported Databases

description: Add user rights tab
name: Add User Rights Tab

description: Converted the entire HTML frontend to React, change backend to support the new format
name: Convert Frontend To React

description: Checked and confirmed functionality of joins
name: Confirming Join Functionality

description: Added filtering ability by columns
name: Added Filtering

description: Checked how to access the databases created in code. Provided connection links for each db along with instructions and test code.
name: Providing Connection Links

description: Add charts like pie chart or bar graph to view the data in a table/collection
name: Adding Charts

description: Added ability to search for specific information in records/documents in each page along with filtering
name: Implemented Search For Records/Collections

description: Used pagination to limit the number of rows read in one go, otherwise gigantic databases can cause crashes
name: Implemented Pagination

description: Add charts like pie chart or bar graph to view the data in a table/collection
name: Adding Support For Charts for Tables/Collections

description: Visualize database structures with autogenerated diagrams like ER Diagrams
name: Implemented Diagram Generation

description: Test for procedures, group by, order by, having clause, aggregate functions (Like AVG, SUM, etc)), joins, functions
name: Testing Crucial Functionalities

description: Fixed issue of MongoDB not showing all the fields in the search bar's filter
name: Fix MongoDB's Search Fields Issue
Adding ER Diagram Relationship Management
description: Added option of managing relationships for er diagrams for making them more efficient and correct, and ensured that these relationships shall be recorded in the diagram statistics for the user to view

name: Modified Insert/Update/Delete Sections In SQL Table Details Page
description: Changed the insert, update and delete sections in sql table details page to becomes buttons which when clicked opens a modal for data entry so that they take up less space in the page
